thread.title: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week: Chelsea, Everton and West Brom dominate in Gameweek 26
thread.title_full: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week: Chelsea, Everton and West Brom dominate in Gameweek 26

title: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week: Chelsea, Everton and West Brom dominate in Gameweek 26
text:
1 of 12 Who makes it into Garth Crooks' Team of the Week from GW26? 
BBC Sport pundit Garth Crooks has named his Team of the Week from the latest round of Premier League matches, and a small group of sides have caught his eye during a truncated fixture list this weekend. 
The former Tottenham Hotspur and Stoke City forward has picked six of his XI from just three clubs, while a pair of strikers who featured in the EFL Cup final also make the cut. 
This week's 4-3-3 formation is disappointingly traditional compared to some of Crooks' more outrageous offerings over the years - who remembers the 3-1-1-5? 
Scroll through the gallery above to see which players have been selected in Crooks' weekly column. Related articles
